title: Introducing:  Tiny Little Rocks
content:
We may have had a Thom Yorke record last year, it’s now been three years since the last Radiohead release and seven since their last release worthy of remembering.

With that in mind, Belgium’s Tiny Little Rocks serves to fill the void for the time being, with his In Rainbows indebted sound proving slightly uncompromising at times, whilst beautiful at others. The four tracks on his Soundcloud perhaps don’t show the greatest diversity of sound, there’s the Muse-esque post-rock build of Again, and the Weird Fishes styled Break The Ice, yet he carries both off with an admirable confidence. Check out Give Me Up and Again below, and head to his Soundcloud for more.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
